failure_detail: Agent cannot update contact information and must escalate to concierge.

policy_gap.specific_gap: AI cannot update phone numbers or contact info
policy_gap.customer_ask: I need to change the phone number
policy_gap.blocker: System restricted to info lookup and link delivery only

summary: The customer successfully received a payment link for their maintenance fees but then requested to update their phone number. Since the AI cannot update contact information, it correctly escalated the call to the concierge department.
verbatim: I need to change the phone number.

actions.detail: Sent link to email on file
Routed to concierge for phone update
